info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 7:58PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Taylor County through 845 PM CDT... At 757 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just south of Merkel, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... View around 815 PM CDT. Tye, Dyess Afb and Caps around 820 PM CDT. Buffalo Gap around 825 PM CDT. Abilene around 830 PM CDT. Wylie around 835 PM CDT. Potosi around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Impact and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 269 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
